entry.title: WM Streaming
entry.content: <div> title="photo sharing"><img class="flickr-photo" src="http://static.flickr.com/56/165801699_45707bd034.jpg" alt="" /><br /> wm stream, originally uploaded by owt.</div> <p> Ok, we got it. Due to only having one TV Card at the moment, we needed a workaround. We now have EyeTV running on a mac, together with CyTV. CyTV then streams whatever comes in via EyeTV to the Network and in the meeting room the old G4 has VLC and shows the stream coming from the MacBook. Other users internally can obviously also tune in. :)</p>

entry.title: Ormigo's first MacBook
entry.content: <div> title="photo sharing"><img class="flickr-photo" src="http://static.flickr.com/50/152457079_ef7628dd18.jpg" alt="" /><br /> MacBook, originally uploaded by owt.</div> <p> sadly it is not mine. But hey, it stays in the family. And you know what, I could keep myself from turning it on, which will be a joy of its new owner. :)</p>

entry.title: John Stewart's Crossfire
entry.content:
I just watched this little bit of TV history where Jon Stewart is interviewed on CNN's crossfire. The guy has always been brilliant and remains brilliant after seeing it. Good one! Go watch: IFILM - Viral Video: Jon Stewart's Brutal Exchange with CNN Host -<!-- technorati tags begin -->

technorati tags: <a rel="tag" href="http://technorati.com/tag/comedy%20central">comedy central</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://technorati.com/tag/jon%20stewart">jon stewart</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://technorati.com/tag/Crossfire">Crossfire</a>, <a rel="tag" href="http://technorati.com/tag/CNN">CNN</a>

<!-- technorati tags end -->

entry.title: The new Globetrotter
entry.content: <div> title="photo sharing"><img class="flickr-photo" src="http://static.flickr.com/35/112853871_fb0f424a0c.jpg" alt="" /><br /> The new Globetrotter, originally uploaded by owt.</div> <p> This is a picture of the new Globetrotter store in the center of cologne. You can try out your kayak or your scuba gear down there in the pool, or see where heat leaks out of your jakes in a big fridge with cameras... lots of cool stuff. great store!</p>

entry.title: Dana attacks!
entry.content: <div> title="photo sharing"><img src="http://photos3.flickr.com/3117657_5f652f45b0.jpg" alt="" /><br /> Dana attacks!, originally uploaded by Tao.</div> <p> Very coool photo by Tao on Flickr. He must have sat in front of the cat for hours to capture this ;)</p>
